game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, you are one of the last remaining mages.
game.ending: You have successfully restored magic and saved the world, but at great personal sacrifice.
game.synopsis: "Echoes of Eternity" is a high-fantasy role-playing game where you embark on a quest to restore balance. Navigate through treacherous lands, confront powerful enemies, and unravel the mysteries behind magic's vanishing. Engage with diverse characters who will either assist or challenge your journey towards peace.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
